Welcome to Bookfreely Help Center

Thank you for choosing Bookfreely for your hotel "management" needs! If you have any questions or need assistance, youre in the right place. Below, youll find answers to frequently asked questions and useful tips on how to make the most of our app.


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

 1. How do I create a new booking?
 To create a new booking, go to the "Bookings" tab and click on the "+" icon. Fill in the required guest information, select the dates, and room type. Click "Save" to confirm the booking.


2. Can I modify or cancel a booking?
 Yes, you can modify or cancel a booking by going to the "Bookings" tab, selecting the booking you want to change, and clicking on the "Edit" or "Cancel" button accordingly.


3. How do I check-in a guest?
 To check in a guest, navigate to the "Check-In" tab, enter the guests name or booking ID, and click "Check In." You can also add additional details such as ID proof and payment information.


4. What payment methods are accepted?
 We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, cash, and mobile payments. Specify the payment method during the booking process or at check-in.


5. How can I contact support?
 If you need further assistance, click on the "Support" option in the app menu. You can submit a support ticket, and our team will get back to you shortly.


Tips for Using [Your App Name] Efficiently
 1. Utilize the Calendar View:
 The calendar view provides a quick overview of your hotels occupancy. Use different colors for different room types to easily distinguish between them.


2. Set Up Notifications:
 Enable notifications to receive alerts for new bookings, check-ins, and check-outs. Stay updated without constantly checking the app.


3. Keep Your Inventory Updated:
 Regularly update room availability to avoid overbooking. Use the "Rooms" tab to manage your room inventory effectively.


4. Use Reports for Insights:
 Explore the reports section to gain insights into your hotels performance. Analyze occupancy rates, revenue, and guest preferences to make informed decisions.

We hope this help section provides you with the necessary guidance to use [Your App Name] effectively. If you have any specific questions or encounter difficulties, dont hesitate to reach out to our support team.


Happy managing!


Bookfreely Team
